attributes.action: call an immediate General Election in light of the Expenses scandal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the revelations of the last week, and the disgraceful expenses claims made by our elected representatives of Parliament, I hereby call on the Prime Minister to call an immediate General Election.  The electorate deserves, and is entitled to, make their feelings known.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
